import { DOCUMENT } from '@angular/common'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '@auth0/auth0-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Manga App'; constructor(@Inject(DOCUMENT) public document: Document, public auth: AuthService) {} isAuthenticated$ = this.auth.isAuthenticated$ }
